data.title: The Golden Age Of Jazz: The Greatest Original Artists Play 96 Of The Greatest Original Recordings
data.meta_description: Jazz music is now a century old and any of the turbulent periods through which the art-form has passed could be accurately justified as having been a ‘Golden Age’. The music’s incubation in New Orleans, its travel up to Chicago, the Swing era, the Be-bop revolution, the ‘Birth of the Cool’ and the arrival of […]
